{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Comtrend |model=NexusLink 3240u |fcc_date=10/02/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=L9VNL3240U |ic_id=4013A-NL3240U |us_id=5SYDL01ANL3240U |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63138Z;BCM63138ZKFSBG, TA1450 P20, 440070-23 Z3; |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3860BC |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=EtronTech |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=Quantenna QTM840 (5S2.3) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3860BC;Quantenna, QT3860BC, AA02F2D1, A03356, 1535; |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;844, 649E, 508;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;<…>;<…>;;4; |flags=ADSL2+, VoIP, DFS (master), TR-069, L2, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ComtrendXXXX_2.4GHz, ComtrendXXXX_5GHz, |oui=D8:B6:B7 |oui_eth=D8:B6:B7 }} {{TagLine|ADSL/VDSL Bonding IAD}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.comtrend.com/Product/95$prod.html}}
The FCC Family model letter document lists additional models :that may have some features removed: * NexusLink 3240 * NexusLink 3120 / NexusLink 3120ua - No VoIP * WAP-5895ua / WR-6895 - No DSL or VoIP
